title: What's new in the latest Google update in summer 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: As Google dies not disclose any information about the nature of the latest core algo updates, only speculative guesses can be made. Some SEO gurus say they are related to E-A-T and based on input from Google’s army of quality raters. But: Even very authoritative websites have lost rankings on one of the recent algo updates, so that either Google is very strict on E-A-T, or the algos are not good enough yet to find out how authoritative a website is. So, the skeptic’s answer is: We don’t know.
